techmeme.title: Nigeria arrests 792 suspects, including 148 Chinese and 40 Filipino nationals, in a raid on a building believed to be a crypto romance scam call center (Elisha Bala-Gbogbo/Reuters)
The UK opens a consultation on AI and copyright, and aims to offer an "opt out" copyright exception, force companies to open models to scrutiny, and more (Financial Times)
Framework releases a $39 modular component to add two extra M.2 slots to the Laptop 16, letting users have 26TB+ of storage, and updates the Laptop 16's cooling (Sean Hollister/The Verge)
Turkish startup Agave Games, developer of Find the Cat, which has 10M+ downloads since its August 2024 release, raised an $18M Series A at a $100M valuation (Ingrid Lunden/TechCrunch)
Beijing-based AI startup Zhipu, which aims to make services tailored to the China market, raised $412M, after raising $400M at a ~$3B valuation in May 2024 (Bloomberg)
